title: Who are the Three champions you always ban when you're first pick?
body:
{{champion:236}} I ban Lucian because his dashes annoy me and he's OP

{{champion:64}} I ban Lee Sin because he's forever OP and is annoying AF when all he does is hit, place ward, dash, run, come backs , runs, dash to ally, comes back, ults, leaves. 

{{champion:89}} I Ban leona because she has 3 stuns, I know the Q is more of a root but it still prevents you from reacting and she gets very annoying when she focus on you.
